servinfo.title: Radiator Cooling Fan Assembly Removal and Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Radiator Cooling Fan Motor On-Vehicle Inspection:For Diesel Engine Model

s1.ptxt: Disconnect connectors (1) of cooling fan motors.
With hose connected, detach P/S fluid reservoir with reservoir bracket.
Remove air cleaner case and air cleaner suction pipe (2).

attention2.ptxt: Be sure not to damage condenser inlet pipe.

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure for installation noting the following.

item.ptxt: Refill cooling system referring to Cooling System Refilling:For Diesel Engine Model .
After installation, verify there is no coolant leakage at each connection.
